name: MicroCHIP
description:
IN THE NEAR FUTURE, HUMANITY STRUGGLES TO DEFEND AGAINST A NEW TYPE OF COMPUTER VIRUS. THE RISE OF MACHINE LEARNING, ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND MINIATURIZED ROBOTICS ALLOWED NEFARIOUS ACTORS ACROSS THE GLOBE TO UNLEASH DEVASTATING ATTACKS AGAINST HIGH VALUE TARGETS.

THE COMPUTER-HUMAN INOCULATION PROCESSOR (CHIP), A NEW WEAPON IN THE BATTLE AGAINST THE VIRUS WAS RECENTLY DEVELOPED TO COUNTER THE RELENTLESS ATTACKS.

THE TIME HAS COME FOR YOU TO TAKE CONTROL AND ELIMINATE ANY THREATS YOU DISCOVER...
